fields.title: Item Specific Speeds
fields.description: Optional array with item specific mining speeds.

fields.title: Seconds To Destroy
fields.description: Sets the number of seconds it takes to mine the block with base equipment. Greater numbers result in greater mining times. A negative number means the block can't be mined

description: Customizes how quickly players can mine the block with different tools. Configure base destruction time and per-item speed modifiers so pickaxes mine stone faster, axes break wood faster, and so on. Essential for creating blocks that follow Minecraft's tool progression and harvesting conventions.
